QuestData.Title: Oil Stop
QuestData.Description: When the yaungols came, they began to dig up oil. What is this "oil", I wonder? Perhaps it is thing of much undiscovered luck. This I must know.$b$bHere, take this vial, and fill it with yaungol oil from one of their windmills. I will give you many fortunes if you bring me some.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fill the Empty Oil Vial at a Yaungol Oil Derrick.
QuestData.CompletionText: Yaungols are scary. Yaungols with a luckydo like this "oil" are more scary.
QuestData.RewardText: Happy day! Your reward. May these coins bring you good fortune.
